QuestData.Title: Measuring Warp Energies
QuestData.Description: If our instincts are right and these manaforges have been made using technology from Tempest Keep, then all of Outland could be in grave danger.$B$BTempest Keep's energy-recharging mechanisms were never supposed to be used this close to the land. The warp energies are capable of destroying this very land, even when contained within Kael's pipelines.$B$BTake this orb to Manaforge B'naar; it is attuned to measure warp energies. Use it at the pipelines' ends, where they go into the earth.
QuestData.LogDescription: Exarch Orelis in Area 52 wants you to take the Warp-Attuned Orb to Manaforge B'naar and use it at the end of its four pipelines.$B$BPerforming quests for the Aldor will cause your Scryers reputation level to decrease.
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you performed the measurements I asked for, $N?
QuestData.RewardText: This is grave news, $N. The warp energies emanating from the pipelines are dangerously high.$B$BWe must find a way to shut down the manaforges or what little remains of Outland will be shattered into pieces.
